snippet.title: Axe Ghost - Demo out on Steam!
snippet.description:
Axe Ghost - Free demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2712670

Outsmart a horde of monsters and vanquish their formidable boss in Axe Ghost, a turn-based, spatial reasoning challenge!

* Use weapons from the cards you're dealt to rearrange and destroy the monsters

* Cut through the horde to face its leader, and vanquish him

* Get a high score by destroying your enemies in large groups

*Beat your rivals in the Daily Challenge leaderboards, or hone your skills in Free Play mode
